senselogic.sitevision.api.format.NumericFormatterBuilder

  • Packages that use NumericFormatterBuilder 
    Package Description
    senselogic.sitevision.api.format
    Formatting utility interfaces

    • Uses of NumericFormatterBuilder in senselogic.sitevision.api.format

      Methods in senselogic.sitevision.api.format that return NumericFormatterBuilder 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      NumericFormatterBuilder FormatterBuilderFactory.getCurrencyFormatterBuilder(Locale aLocale)
      Returns a builder for creating currency formatters with a given Locale.
      NumericFormatterBuilder FormatterBuilderFactory.getCurrencyFormatterBuilder(Locale aLocale, Currency aCurrency)
      Returns a builder for creating currency formatters with a given Locale and Currency.
      NumericFormatterBuilder FormatterBuilderFactory.getNumberFormatterBuilder(Locale aLocale)
      Returns a builder for creating number formatters with a given Locale.
      NumericFormatterBuilder FormatterBuilderFactory.getPercentFormatterBuilder(Locale aLocale)
      Returns a builder for creating percent formatters with a given Locale.
      NumericFormatterBuilder NumericFormatterBuilder.setMaxFractionDigits(int aMaxFractionDigits)
      Sets the maximum number of digits allowed in the fraction portion of a number.
      NumericFormatterBuilder NumericFormatterBuilder.setMaxIntegerDigits(int aMaxIntegerDigits)
      Sets the maximum number of digits allowed in the integer portion of a number.
      NumericFormatterBuilder NumericFormatterBuilder.setMinFractionDigits(int aMinFractionDigits)
      Sets the minimum number of digits allowed in the fraction portion of a number.
      NumericFormatterBuilder NumericFormatterBuilder.setMinIntegerDigits(int aMinIntegerDigits)
      Sets the minimum number of digits allowed in the integer portion of a number.
      NumericFormatterBuilder NumericFormatterBuilder.setUseGrouping(boolean aUseGrouping)
      Set whether or not grouping will be used in this formatter.

Sitevision - Portal and Content Management Made Easy
Sitevision is an advanced Java enterprise portal product and a portlet container (JSR 286) that implements Java Content Repository (JSR 283).
